com.tapad.tapestry

Class TapestryRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tapad.tapestry.TapestryRequest

  • public class TapestryRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A mutable class for building requests that are sent with TapestryClient. Building a request adds parameters to the HTTP query string that will be sent to Tapestry Web API.

    An example of building a request: 

     TapestryRequest request = new TapestryRequest()
     .addAudiences("aud1", "aud2", "aud3")
     .addAudiences("aud4")
     .addData("color", "blue")
     .addData("model", "ford")
     .listDevices()
     .depth(2);

      • addData

        public TapestryRequest addData(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Adds a value to a data key. Only one value can be added per request, so calling this method with the same key more than once will simply replace any existing values with the most recent.
        Parameters:
        key - The data key
        value - The value to add to the key

      • addAudiences

        public TapestryRequest addAudiences(java.lang.String... audiences)
        Adds this device to one or more audiences.
        Parameters:
        audiences - A list of audiences

      • removeAudiences

        public TapestryRequest removeAudiences(java.lang.String... audiences)
        Removes this device to one or more audiences.
        Parameters:
        audiences - A list of audiences

      • listDevices

        public TapestryRequest listDevices()
        Tells Tapestry to return all the devices listed out as well as combined. The list of devices can be accessed in TapestryResponse.getDevices()

      • strength

        public TapestryRequest strength(int strength)
        Parameters:
        strength - The strength value between 1-5 inclusive. Default is 2

      • depth

        public TapestryRequest depth(int depth)
        Tells Tapestry to consider devices this many steps away from the source device.
        Parameters:
        depth - The depth value between 0-2 inclusive. Default is 1

      • userIds

        public TapestryRequest userIds(java.lang.String type,
                      java.lang.String id)
        Sets the cross-device user id
        Parameters:
        type - The type of user id, e.g. "google email address"
        id - The id itself, e.g. "user@gmail.com"

      • analytics

        public TapestryRequest analytics(java.lang.Boolean isNewSession)
        Sets the analytics parameter for tracking in analytics platforms
        Parameters:
        isNewSession - Has enough time elapsed to be considered a new tracking session
